name: Gindara Marinade Sauce, Tamarind
description: Gindara Marinade sauces are a blend of authentic Sri Lankan flavours with a hot base of Nai Miris (Ghost Pepper). Its for the daring who relish the spicy hotness of Nai Miris infused with the freshest and the finest locally selected ingredients.*Images are illustration purpose only. Product received may vary.
